summary: Sarah, a beautiful and gifted 15-year-old from a wealthy but chaotic family, holds on to one dream: to run away from home and to become a professional ballet dancer.
cast: Marie Vinck|Veerle Baetens|Zakaria Bchiri|Marc Bogaerts|Leonie Borgs|Zoe Cnaepkens|Axel Daeseleire|Tom De Hoog|Josse De Pauw|Corazon De Raeymaecker|Evert De Vos|Jan Decleir|Els Dottermans|Annik Herbots|Laurens L'Enfant|Steven Loonen|Ides Meire|Meredith Meire|Elias Mentzel|Odrada Raemakers|Falke Van der Schueren|Judith van Herck|Fedja van Huêt|Leo van Huêt|Hilde Van Mieghem|Wim Vanlessen
title: De kus
